Class Die6

java.lang.Object
  Die6

public class Die6
extends java.lang.Object

Abstracts one six-sided die (plural is dice)

Constructor Summary

          Constructor to do an initial roll to set the first value
 
Method Summary
 int getValue()
          Getter for value
 void roll()
          Roll the die! Generate random number 1 <= x <= 6 and assign to value Note that roll does NOT return the new value

          Roll the die and return the new value
